string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "I got the, the gift of gad, somethin that you wish you had, Don't even get a strap now I'd rather kick a rap."
"Yeah, free livin', I swear, I be on some hippie shit. But gateway fresher than the hippies did."
"Oh yeah this life is good, don't let it all go to waste."
"I don't wanna be inside today, just keep it rollin like we ridin' skates I got a happy of haze. So i'm thinkin we gon' get high today, And let the sun shine all in my face."
"My life's a topic of a lullabye."
"I ain't got a damn thing on my mind and baby all we got is time, lets just watch the clouds go by."
"5-star chefs stay cooking in the kitchen but only making that good shit, see the way im living they like oh my goodness."
"Tonight might be the night i make it so lets live it up and don't regret it at all."
"Being broke starts to get a little old. My money had to get some fine tunin."
"We just some motha fuckin' kids."
"It's hard to say that I'd rather stay awake when I'm a sleep."
"I say it feels just like a dream 'bout to wake up from a nap."
"Yeah they give me money but I gotta go and spend it Man, I been a bad little jew but I gotta pay the bills now so I gotta chill out I ain't walkin round like I'm splurging wit a mil now."
"Celebrate that we seein' another day, life good."
"If you ever hated anticipate that I'm famous."
"Me I'm highly underestimated, so educated that gettin paid quick."
"Everything is never as it seems."
"It's hard to say that I'd rather stay awake when I'm a sleep."
"No disrespect though, I gotta get that cigarette flow for the green pesto, presto."
"So these funny little girls wanna take a trip. But no, only the M.O.S.T. dope with me other fools home or, boy? and cig free."
"I'm the youngen hoes tryna make a baby with 'cause it'll make 'em rich."
"Girl I don't wanna share you. We could be together, but you scared to."
"I know this girl who want the world to call her own. Goin through these dudes like some minutes on a phone. And once she leave She ain't comin back home."
"Shorty just attacked me from the blindside. Used to be a player now I'm sidelined. Connect like wi-fi, Mixed like tye-dye."
"They told me never fall in love, It never works out in your favor. You way too young and right now that's just human nature."
"Catch me smoking weed where the Wild things are."
"Shorty just attacked me from the blindside. Used to be a player now I'm sidelined. Connect like wi-fi, Mixed like tye-dye."
"Can't believe they eyes swear it's just a mirage."
"Ain't ever seen a young rapper like moi."
"That was all gravy but I knew I wanted more."
"Every single summer takin trips to the shore."
"Used to go to school hang with friends and play sports."
"Yeah I live a life pretty similar to yours."
"Weed got me laughin like a damn hyena."
"Dream of rockin crowds."
"It's a work of art I ain't talkin mona lisa."
"Hey kool aid and frozen pizza."
"The can't understand my concept."
"Bout to be in music stores everywhere but not yet."
"Cali for the kush cause boy I know there's plenty there."
"So I can go anywhere."
"Well a little more cash and my own fast jet."
"Could I want that I don't have yet."
"A couple trophies on my shelf so what else."
"So far I've done pretty well for myself."
"I ain't gonna need those I'm a go hard."
"Still got my training wheels in the garage."
"I'm feelin like this could be my last shot."
"I don't even talk about it boy I just do it."
"I smoke herb and I make music."
"Everything I drop recorded by big jerm."
"If you didn't know well I'm from the BURGH."
"Companies send me clothes so I'm wearin em."
"Clean conscience good Samaritan."
"These blogs gotta know I'm on next."
"Haven't had a fall yet."
"I been climbin up the great wall."
"Takin' sips from the fountain of youth, if you ain't heard about the kid then you outta the loop!"
"Just some mother fuckin' kids!"
"So take it while you got it try to get a little more they say im gettin better than i ever been before, well thats for sure, tell em what i do rap, keep me fed like a spoon gettin soup."
"Its all good everybody tryin to eat tonight, tryna go to sleep, have good dreams tonight."
"So ive been fucking all these hoes, and ive been blowin all this cash and baby this just the beginning, ima make all of it back."
"Im a fuckin workaholic with a passion in my heart treatin rappin as an art which you have to be a part of. I just copped a new car to hear its all up try to do the right thing, please karma."
"So i can feel, but i cant touch? You said my love was a bit too much. Broke my heart cant find no crush. So why dont you come on back home?"
"I aint here, i guess you cant call back sex, drugs and rock and roll, i think ill take all that."
"Ive been out here on the road, now they missin me at home, all these ex girls that i used to know are hittin up my phone."
"Im on the road, my girl so sad Im gone. Its hard when I cant even find the time to call my mom."
"Been working all my life to do some different stuff. For people to say Im young and havent lived enough."
"Dealing with everybodys opinion. Trying to do me. Only down one, Im in the final Shooting threes."
"Go ham, like Abraham reading all the signs. Oh yeah, and dont forget to call your moms."
"The movie never stopped the frank changeover. We add a map to the wolfpack: hangover."
"So gangsta, like the occupation of Made Men. Creating chaos, my operation is Mayhem."
"Word. Im so sick with the verbs I use. The words to heal us. They love how I kill it on stage, man. Murder theaters."
"Now I think Im cool cause I got a pair of shoes. A mug dog, a jacket with a Polo logo. My cup always filled with Henny. So no Four Loko."
"Drums with a pump like some Reeboks. See me from the treetops. They worry but they need not. Heating like a teapot."
"Is what Ive become, young and Im dumb Been spending cake to get some bump in the trunk."
"Take over the world when Im on my Donald Trump shit, look at all this money, aint that some shit."
"Hit strip clubs find bitches with big butts. I dont give a fuck Im getting drunk, only live once."
"Marijuana for everybody in yamakas. I dont give a fuck till my homies put some bottles up."
"Bill Clinton pimping, always with a Monica. Days Inn.. turn that shit to hotel erotica."
"I aint got time for all the problems, no I never did my trig smile on my face got me feeling like the shit."
"I aint give a fuck, I hear em talking I dont listen Im up. In the clouds looking down, I aint even in a rush."
"I been laughed at, hated on, no one would even play my songs. Wouldnt even listen to anything that my name was on."
"I just wanna ride, ride through the city in a Cutlass. Find a big butt bitch, somewhere get my nuts kissed."
"You know how much you love it when you get it in abundance. Give a f-ck about a budget when you always be the subject of discussion."
"Ay yo, the flyest mutha-fcka up in the room. Yeah, you know its me. Bitches hating on him, cause he started out here locally. Hopefully, Ill be at the top soon."
"Some people just need to stop thinking about everything they do and just do it."
"People tend to think all the drinks on me. I don't even have no money to spare to buy patron for you and all your friends."
